hero.title: Recipe Pixie
hero.subtitle: Your magical recipe collection – from anywhere, powered by AI

whatIs.title: What is Recipe Pixie?
whatIs.description: Recipe Pixie is your personal AI-powered recipe collection. Save recipes from any website with just one click, organize them intelligently, and let AI help you – whether shopping, meal planning, or cooking.

aiParser.title: 1. 🧠 AI Parser – Every Recipe, Every Source
aiParser.description: Simply add a link – Recipe Pixie automatically detects all ingredients, steps, and cooking times. Works with virtually any recipe website worldwide.

smartOrganization.title: 2. 📂 Smart Organization
smartOrganization.description: Create folders, add tags, and find the right recipe instantly – by ingredient, cooking time, or occasion.

shoppingList.title: 3. 🛒 Shopping List in Seconds
shoppingList.description: Select multiple recipes, and Recipe Pixie automatically generates a combined shopping list. Perfect for weekly planning.

mealPlanning.title: 4. 📅 Meal Planning & Calendar
mealPlanning.description: Plan your week ahead: Drag and drop recipes into your personal meal calendar.

aiAssistant.title: 5. 💬 AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Ask questions like 'What can I cook with tomatoes and mozzarella?' or 'How do I substitute eggs in this recipe?' – AI helps instantly.

multiDevice.title: 6. 📱 Available Everywhere
multiDevice.description: Web app, mobile-optimized – your recipes are synced across all devices.

communitySharing.title: 7. 🌍 Community & Sharing
communitySharing.description: Share your favorite recipes with friends or discover new recipes from the Recipe Pixie community.

perfectFor.title: Perfect for:
perfectFor.hobbyChefs: 🍳 Hobby chefs who want to organize their recipe collection
perfectFor.healthConscious: 🌱 People with specific dietary goals (vegan, gluten-free, low carb...)

hero.title: Captain's Log
hero.subtitle: Your modern digital logbook for relaxed sailing. Record courses, sails, weather and wind, track your route via GPS tracking and export professional PDF reports – all offline-capable and multilingual.

whatIs.title: What is Captain's Log?
whatIs.description: Captain's Log is the modern solution for your maritime logbook. The web app combines traditional logbook keeping with digital technology and makes documenting your sailing trips easier than ever before.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for professional logbook keeping

voyageManagement.title: ⚓️ Voyage Management
voyageManagement.description: Create, edit and track all your trips with start/destination port, date and status

gpsTracking.title: 🧭 Live GPS Tracking
gpsTracking.description: Automatically record your route – with speed, course and precise distance calculation

timeline.title: 📍 Detailed Timeline
timeline.description: Capture all important events – course changes, sail configuration, weather changes, notes

sailConfig.title: ⛵ Sail Configuration
sailConfig.description: Document mainsail, reef levels, headsail (jib/genoa) and spinnaker deployment

weather.title: 🌊 Weather & Navigation
weather.description: Record wind (direction & strength), weather, sea state and visibility

pdfExport.title: 📄 PDF Export
pdfExport.description: Generate professional voyage reports with map, timeline and all details – perfect for ship's log

anchorWatch.title: 🔔 GPS Anchor Watch
anchorWatch.description: Monitor your anchor position with adjustable radius and automatic alarm

offline.title: 🌍 Offline-Ready & Multilingual
offline.description: Works without internet connection (PWA-capable). Available in German, English, Spanish and French

perfectFor.title: Perfect for
perfectFor.hobbySkippers: 🧭 Hobby sailors and skippers who appreciate professional documentation
perfectFor.sailingSchools: ⛵ Sailing schools for training voyages and education
perfectFor.documentation: 📝 Anyone who wants to record their sailing experiences in a structured way

techStack.title: Technical Details
techStack.description: Fullstack Progressive Web App (PWA) built with React, TypeScript, Leaflet Maps and Lovable Cloud (Supabase). Features: Real-time GPS tracking with Geolocation API, PDF generation (pdf-lib), realtime updates, RLS-secured database, multilingual i18n support, responsive design with Tailwind CSS.
